alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 1:52PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Henderson and southeastern Des Moines Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 152 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Biggsville, or 7 miles south of Oquawka, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gladstone around 205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Burlington and Gulf Port. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
